title: Refilling Grain Drill with Pasture Mix/Oats/Red Clover to Reseed Old Pasture

tasks.task: Preparing a drill for reseeding a pasture
subtasks: Adjusting the depth of gauge wheels
Adjusting the disc openers
Mixing seed varieties (oats, fescue, timothy, leftover wheat)
Running fingers through seed for tactile inspection
Determining the amount of seed needed (enough for three to four acres)
Recycling leftover wheat seed
Loading clover seed (medium red and frosty berseem) into the grass seed box
Preparing to transport the drill with the grain card and trailer

tasks.task: Planting corn
subtasks: Planning to plant corn in approximately two weeks

tasks.task: Managing wheat sales
subtasks: Selling leftover spring wheat at half price to a neighbor

subtasks: followed by the subtasks. But checking the original problem's notes, the user wants "a series of tasks based on the transcript that a person would have to perform. A task should be a generalization, and made up of smaller sub-tasks." So if required to separate the subtasks, here's an example:

tasks.task: Preparing a drill for reseeding a pasture
Planting corn
Assuming they want seven tasks and two or more subtasks each, then that's MAINTASK with four to five subtasks each.
